org.flossware.jcore.operation

Interface Failure<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of object used when a failure arose.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullFailure

    public interface Failure<V>
    If needed, this interface can be used by classes to decouple denoting some operation was a failure.
    Author:
    Scot P. Floess

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void failed(V obj, Throwable failure)
      Called when an operation failed.

    • Method Detail

      • failed

        void failed(V obj,
          Throwable failure)
        Called when an operation failed.
        Parameters:
        obj - being operated upon when a failure arose.
        failure - is what arose when operating upon obj.
